title: I just want to say how upset I am about the Fiora rework...
body:
I feel like my main champ was ruined. 

People who don't play her ever day are unsympathetic including Riot.

I'm not trying to be negative. 

You flat out ruined my main champ Riot and you never fixed it. 

It ruined the game for me almost.

Imagine you are 1vs5... this is something that happens allot when your team doesn't lift a finger to help you.

You made her ult so it benefits teamates who aren't even there most of the time. 

Fiora is a loner and I get you wanted to change that but she's still a loner and people don't group with her to take advantage of her ult.

It's a flop and I said it from day one.

You ruined her lunge.

Her lunge was everything. 

No longer can I get a level 1 pentakill...

You DON'T play her every day like I do and you DON'T care about her as much as I do.

Get over yourselves...

I want an apology not someone playing god deleting the entire thread.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rnA7B84I,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-07-03T07:08:30.321+0000)
>
> 
> People who dont play her ever day are unsympathetic including Riot.
>
 > I feel like my main champ was ruined. 
>
> Im not trying to be negative. 
>
> Fiora is a loner and I get you wanted to change that but shes still a loner and people dont group with her to take advantage of her ult.
>
> No longer can I get a level 1 pentakill..

You don't see anything wrong with these comments op?

I'm sorry you feel the need to complain about not getting level 1 pentakills. 

I'm sure we all miss that. Of we don't because such a concept is fucking stupid considering that it's highly unlikely that all five of the enemy team is close enough to die to you.

I just had skills...

I was the best Fiora in all of leauges. 

Now I'm best known for feeding because she is such a nerfed champ now.

They ruined her LUNGE!   Fiora's lunge was her everything. 

Without the double lunge no more level 1 pentakills.  It's impossible. 

Nobody was getting them but me. It's not cause she was an over powered champ. She was just right.

She used to be = to say a Zed or a Master Yi. 

Now she's squishy and does nothing when you ult 1vs5. 

It's a placebo ult. Some complain about her old ult being too amazing...   

She's a "no skill champ" but those are just people bitter because I beat them with my mad skills.

And I didn't beat them with my ult. I beat them with my lunge. 

Take away her lunge....   Take away Fiora.

Riot just ruined her and that's the facts coming from the greatest Fiora player of all time. 

Do you think anybody at Riot cares more about Fiora than me?

She's a totally different champ. 

I long for the day they bring her back.

But I think they actually wanted to ruin her instead of make her better. 

Just before the rework they banned me from ranked as if to pick on me specifically for being so good.

I was getting 40 and 0 so everybody cried to riot because they weren't as good at the game.

I'm not happy with any other champ but her.

I'm defiantly not happy with the rework and sometimes I just want to feed in apathy.

Just. Move. On. 

It's a game. That's all.
i miss when fiora was before the first rework... , the 1v5 and the ultimate just jesus fucking christ
I'm sorry you missed your Point & Click tons of damage ult.

Hey, Fiora main here (since before her rework). I felt your pain with all the changes, but i must say its okay, really :)
i still dont quite like her Ult, just like you said...1/100000 times people will actually help take advatage of it...and if i manage to pop it...they barely use it and die...like idiots -_- and im left pinging aaaall the heal they could have had.
i think the Q, W, and E are good tho! guaranteed crits are perfect so we dont have to build crit, i do wish the atk speed would last a bit longer than 1 hit though :S
the Q has almost full reset, so thats awesome. and the W....o god, nothing can counter it, and it counters ANYTHING...much better than the old.
The ult was the main essence of our old Fiora...and i still wish theyd change it to something else..but i really think with everything else they did a good job, now that ive played it for so long.

P.S. HORRIBLE face and Hair updates, no one liked that, no one gets used to her Handsome Squidward face. disgusting, gimme my sexy Swordmistress back.
